title: Altar (Saradomin)

properties.name: description
properties.value: An Altar dedicated to Saradomin can be found in many places across Gielinor. These altars can all be used to recharge prayer points.

content:
This article is about altars dedicated to Saradomin that have no other uses than recharging prayer. For other altars, see Altar.

An Altar dedicated to Saradomin can be found in many places across Gielinor. These altars can all be used to recharge prayer points.

An '''Altar''' dedicated to [[Saradomin]] can be found in many places across [[Gielinor]]. These altars can all be used to recharge [[prayer]] points.

==Locations==
